thread.content:
Many are saying that we're going "overboard" with our deep, incisive film analysis, so we're going to "test the waters" with the 2018 classic "Overboard" (2018)!

Follow us on the hashtag #goverboard18
Hello, I'm Alan and I'll be commenting on Overboard today. I'm excited to #goverboard18
Hello, I'm Hervey and I'll also be commenting on Overboard today. I remember liking the original as a kid, and Anna Faris is talented, this is probably fine #goverboard18
Very nice Pantelion logo hit. #goverboard18

Many are saying that we're going "overboard" with our deep, incisive film analysis, so we're going to "test the waters" with the 2018 classic "Overboard" (2018)!

Follow us on the hashtag #goverboard18
I believe in Pantelion #goverboard18
BIG FUN MUSIC HIT. We're in it now! #goverboard18
So this is co-produced by a telenovela company, and promotes a pro-telenovela worldview? Seems like self-dealing #goverboard18
The GrubHub song! #GrubHubSong #GrubHubHit #goverboard18
Mr Boogie dances to this song #greatesthitofalltime #goverboard18
"Montenegro Industries" does sound exactly like a soap opera company. #goverboard18
Are those Oregon plates canon? I would have guessed this was Florida #goverboard18
Wow, a family of displaced Seahawks fans #goverboard18
Some call Overboard (2018) the ultimate Seahawks fan film. #Seahawks #GoHawks #HawksNest #GoSeahawks #SeahawksNation #goverboard18
Very neon-red bloody mary #goverboard18
Bloody Mary with a cucumber garnish? Oof. #goverboard18
I don't like spending time with Leonardo #goverboard18
Very Jack Black-looking guy here. #goverboard18
I think he looks more like Hurley from Lost #hurleyfromlost #goverboard18
This is honestly a surprising amount of subtitled content for a movie attempting to be a mass-market comedy in 2018 #goverboard18
Have we established why this yacht doesn't have onboard cleaning staff? #goverboard18
He's not the CEO of Montenegro Industries *yet* #goverboard18
It's a party on the bridge!!! #goverboard18
She refuses to go overboard #goverboard18
She has gone overboard! #goverboard18
This actor really sells "an annoying guy you don't want to spend time with", let's see how well he puts over being the opposite of this #goverboard18
Yessss we've got Norsk Jam on the bridge. Love the bridge music. #BridgeMusic #goverboard18
I worry Leonardo is in danger of going overboard #goverboard18
This Norsk Jam is so good. #NorskJam #goverboard18
Incredible XBOX360 vibe with the exteriors of the yacht, including Leonardo dancing #goverboard18
Leonardo has gone overboard #goverboard18
I guess they're not displaced Seahawks fans, they've moved from Seattle to a small town in Oregon where people still root for the Seahawks #importantcorrection #goverboard18
Oregon is Seahawks country! #HawksNest #SeahawksNation #LetsGoHawks #goverboard18
Frankie's Tiki Room shirt! #goverboard18
Best jukebox in any tiki bar #goverboard18
Good refrigerator full of Budweiser and Bud Light. #goverboard18
This does have "the 2018 look" (glowy soft light, soft colors), though maybe that's still the look now #goverboard18
GOOD gag with the Speedy Gonzales tattoo. #goverboard18
Wow, they sent him home with a pair of scrubs from the hospital. Free scrubs! #FreeScrubs #goverboard18

Nothing really groundbreaking here, but I appreciate that this movie actually moves from gag to gag without getting bogged down with boring shit

A lesser movie would have a *ton* of time for tedious set-up #goverboard18
I hope they make good cookbooks for amnesiacs #goverboard18
Massive Bud Light product placement throughout. #BudLight #goverboard18
I'm not sure his contributed domestic labor is actually in the black so far #goverboard18
This is a strong incentive scheme for maintaining sobriety, very clever #goverboard18
This whole film is just one massive Seahawks fan fest. #goverboard18
This appears to be a very inefficient construction crew #goverboard18

I was just thinking about how good most of these exteriors look, the cinematographer's other films are largely not that impressive, but then I note that he married Anna Faris in 2021, huh #goverboard18
Some nice shots in this store. #goverboard18
The family needs a new oven mitt #goverboard18
I forget how much of the original Overboard comprised psychological torture of this level, this guy is really being ground the fuck down #goverboard18
The construction crew is once again playing it very fast and loose. #goverboard18
Allowing the amnesiac to man the hose seems like it's wasting a lot of material #goverboard18

This movie is obliquely evoking the same feelings as Mulholland Dr; this scene where he's inarticularly speaking about something in his life just feeling *off* is really wistful and troubling #goverboard18
It's legitimately very pleasant to listen to lots of rapid-fire subtitled Spanish. #goverboard18
I know many television stations where you can enjoy that sort of thing #goverboard18
This shirt he's wearing seems like a much better fit for construction than the Seahawks jersey he originally picked, and it fits better, did he just pick it up? #goverboard18
Papi's going downhill #papi #hegone #goverboard18
When is this Seahawks game happening? It doesn't seem like fall or winter in Oregon. #goverboard18
This feels like a summer vibe, surprised that it's football season (maybe it's an old game on tape) #goverboard18
(I had that in the tank, but felt compelled to fire it off instead of eating it) #goverboard18
"M. Brody" on the badge of the police officer confirming the lack of shark attack. #JawsReference #goverboard18
I choose to believe he's canonically Brody #Jaws5 #goverboard18
Leonardo is possibly dying from this wound #goverboard18
Very nicely organized spice rack in the kitchen. #NiceSpice #goverboard18
Why does he keep his urine bottle in the kitchen cabinet instead of simply keeping it in his shack? Doesn't make any sense #goverboard18
I can't tell how much of Leonardo's sudden change of heart is coming from him realizing the value of kindness to others vs. him being denied sex for 30 days. #goverboard18

I think it's just him being tired from work and the poor sleep one gets sleeping on a cot

A couple weeks on a cot is rough #goverboard18
NFL Play 60 logo on the football. I think the NFL had rather deep involvement in this film. #goverboard18
This bubblegum-jangle indie pop playing during the flag football game absolutely feels like a PSA the NFL would sponsor in the mid-2010s #goverboard18
This is all getting far too heartwarming. #goverboard18
This actually reminds me of the beachside Oregon town we had a family reunion at in the mid-1990s, they had an ice cream place that had a really good bubblegum ice cream flavor #goverboard18
Papi is now thriving #welcomebackpapi #goverboard18
Welcome back, Papi, to the land of the living! #goverboard18
She's way too premature to confessing to her brainwashing conspiracy and possible kidnapping, classic mistake #goverboard18
She should at least wait until she passes her nursing test, the ostensible goalline that the film set up #goverboard18
It's Nephew! #nephewcansing #goverboard18
Very pleasant marina at night. #goverboard18

The heartwarming sequences are awfully slow

This is basically pleasant, but this isn't earful tempo #goverboard18
The construction crew continues to be very sloppy. #goverboard18
Wow, they fixed the hole in the roof offscreen at some point, things are really coming together #goverboard18
Kate is being gaslighted by her damn family #goverboard18
The kids have been converted! #goverboard18
#LeonardoLife #TeamLeonardo #goverboard18
It does help the believability that Leonardo is believably gullible and dim. #goverboard18
SHE'S A NURSE! #goverboard18
Kate passed; roll the credits #goverboard18

Still not really sure how anybody would buy the Eva Longoria excuse for the condoms, including how Kate is *covering for her*? Kate confessed to infidelity to cover for their friend putting condoms in the company car to sleep with people who buy pizza? #goverboard18
More Bud Light! This film is brought to you by the NFL, the Seattle (and Oregon) Seahawks, and Bud Light. #goverboard18
Good choice by the movie to have the incidental character who shows up every 25 minutes be very recognizable (very fat, huge beard) #goverboard18
Now they're married for real! #goverboard18
Instant amnesia cure #gottabethedog #goverboard18
Papi Montenegro looks a lot like Prince Philip #goverboard18
This film has taken a dark turn. #DarkTurn #goverboard18
I hope he doesn't forget the most important thing of all, his newfound love for the Seattle Seahawks #goverboard18
He gets to keep the Seahawks shirt! #GoHawks #SeahawksNation #HawksNation #GoSeahawks #goverboard18
Honestly a bit surprised that Kate doesn't face any criminal cases for her misdeeds, her plan succeeded perfectly #goverboard18
Look on the bright side: Kate is a nurse now! #goverboard18
Exactly! One month of an extra paycheck and free domestic labor, and now she's accredited #PlanExecutedToAT #goverboard18
I have a good suggestion for Montenegro Industries: 120 lb bags of cement #goverboard18
It was all in service of this incredible theatrical performance. Very nice to see it all pay off. #goverboard18
The Sullivan family doesn't care for Gilbert and Sullivan, how ironic #goverboard18
"Pizza nurse" appears to be a clever pun in Spanish #goverboard18
VERY good shot with them all wearing binoculars on the boat. #goverboard18
He's gotta goverboard! #goverboard18
He has gone overboard #goverboard18
Kate has also gone overboard #goverboard18
Sofia really coming out on top, huge #goverboard18
Colin's in the kitchen! Hell yeah! #goverboard18
I like how the photoshopped family photos remain hung up even after the scheme has been sunk #goverboard18
Very fun, enjoyable film. Probably not an Earful movie, though. #goverboard18

Yeah, not dense enough and varied enough to be earful imo

Pleasant little movie, though perhaps a little too heavy on the big story beats; but I called it: it's fine #goverboard18
Not nearly as good as Fool's Gold (2008) though #goverboard18
